nodes.text: Asadia Boresa was a Twi'lek female slicer who lived on Coruscant during the Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire.

A Twi'lek female, Asadia Boresa lived on the planet Coruscant where she worked at the Senate Commercial District below the Senate Building during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. A slicer, Boresa passed on her knowledge to others searching to learn the skill.
